short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss a moment. Record events that already happened.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of missing that great moment with your smartphone because you didn't press record?

With ProAm 2.0 you no longer have to decide to press record before the action happens. Just point your phone and ProAm will continuously record and playback the action to you. When something of interest happens, just hit record on the delayed playback window to capture the action.

Main features

· Continuously record the action then choose which moments to save.
· Save and playback those special moments
· Download saved videos to your phone (Android only)
· Compatible with Android and iOS

Requirements

· 4G or broadband network connection
